features:
This accessible tool evaluates color contrast based on both WCAG 2 and APCA methods.

It provides Live Preview with APCA-specific details, assisting messages, helpful explanations, and permalink support.

APCA is a new method of contrast evaluation, which is based on human perception of color. It is included in WCAG 3 drafts (as of publication).
title: A+Tech Color Contrast Checker
